4316940.name: The Dice Lodge
4316940.description:
Roll dice in your cabin as strange visitors arrive to test their luck against yours. Earn gold, buy upgrades between rounds, and survive unpredictable modifiers in this roguelike dice battler where every roll matters.

Face off against a cast of strange visitors in this dice rolling roguelike where every roll matters. How many challengers can you overcome?

Between battles, stock up on potions, reroll tokens, and extra dice to tilt the odds in your favor. But beware each round comes with a random modifier. Sometimes luck is on your side, sometimes it isn’t, and sometimes both you and your opponent reap the rewards. No two runs are ever the same!

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
